medium- and long-term sector policies. The specific objectives are to: (i) improve the economic policy-making process by
strengthening related technical capabilities; and (ii) improve coordination between the Ministry of Finance (MHyFP) and
the sector ministries in the development of medium- and long-term sector policies.

title: CCLIP Neighborhood Upgrading Program, First Individual Project
description: The CCLIP and the Individual Loan will contribute to the sustainable improvement of the habitat of the families living in irregular neighborhoods with severe deficiencies in public infrastructure, and do not enjoy ownership of the properties in which they live. The CCLIP and the Individual Loan will have four components: i) Public infrastructure and equipment; ii) Land tenure legalization; iii) Increase of social and human capital; and iv) Institutional strengthening at national and local levels.

title: Barrio Improvement Program
description: Improve the quality of life and contribute to the urban and social inclusion of Argentine households of the poorest segments of the population residing in villages and informal settlements

title: Clean Production and Environment Management
description: To promote policies and practice in cleaner production and ecoefficiency in S&MEs in Argentina and improve environmental management and rehabilitation in the mining sector.

title: Multi-sectorial Pre-investment Program III (CCLIP)
description: The aim of the program is to increase the efficiency, optical allocation, and the productivity of the public investment that contributes to the economic and social developments of the country through the elaboration of general and specific pre-investment studies. The program has two components: (i) the preparation of pre-investment studies (specific pre-feasibility studies, feasibility and final draws of projects that respond to the strategy and the priorities established by the authorities and general studies) and general studies, including global and sectorial studies that will assist in the identification of specific projects or in the analysis of alternatives for decision making about the opportunities and conveniences of analyzing an operation; and (ii) support of studies' management, including consultancies to support the identification of ideas or the preparation of TORs of projects or pre-investment programs.

title: Program to Support the Federal Policy for Enhancing Early Literacy
description: Contribute to the enhancement of early literacy and to strengthening coordination between the national and subnational levels in education.

title: Program for the Implementation of the National Financial Inclusion Strategy of Argentina
description: To contribute to increased financial service access and use for households and businesses through: (i) implementation of the National Financial Inclusion Strategy; and (ii) increased access to credit for micro and small enterprises (MSEs)

title: Social and Urban Integration Program
description: Promote social and urban integration of the country's vulnerable neighborhoods, prioritizing those included in the National Registry of Informal Neighborhoods (RENABAP).

title: First Individual Operation of the Program for the Integration of the Argentine Health System
description: Expand access to and effective coverage of health services for the population with exclusive public coverage.

title: Promoting Risk Mitigation Instruments and Finance for Renewable Energy and Energy Efficiency Investments
description: The general objective of the project is to promote the efficiency in theproduction and use of energy in Argentina. The specific objectives are: (i) increase Small and MediumEnterprises (SME) (defined as per Argentine's government classification) investments in RenewableEnergy (RE) and Energy Efficiency (EE), by providing access to medium and long-term finance; and(ii) contribute to the reduction of Greenhouse Gas (GHG) emissions.

title: Federal Program for Regional Transport Infrastructure
description: The general objective of the program is to help make the provinces more competitive. The specific objective is to improve the quality of service on the Provincial Road Network and the Municipal Road Network

title: Program to Improve Chaco-Corrientes Connectivity: New Bridge over the Paraná River - First Individual Operation
description: The general objective is to strengthen connectivity in a sustainable manner between the provinces of Chaco and Corrientes. The specific objective is to improve the level of service and resilience in the physical connection between RN11 and RN12 in the provinces of Chaco and Corrientes.

title: Program for Enhancing Water Security in the Province of Mendoza
description: Water security improvement program in the Province of Mendoza

title: Program to Strengthen the Management Capacity of Buenos Aires Province
description:
The program objective is to contribute to making the administrative and technical management of public
investment processes of the Government of Buenos Aires Province more effective, to reduce the loss of social benefits as
a result of delays in implementing road, water access, and school infrastructure projects.

title: Program to Support Public Policies for the Sustainable and Resilient Growth of Argentina
description: The general development objective is to contribute to sustainable and resilient growth in Argentina. The specific development objectives are: (i) strengthen the government's capacity for planning and financing climate action; (ii) develop a favorable framework for sustainable finance; and (iii) promote policies that contribute to the circular economy and decarbonization.

title: Federal Fiscal Management Strengthening Program
description: The general development objective is to improve the technical efficiency of public expenditure. The specific objective is to improve the efficiency of public resource management processes and systems.

title: Urban Social Integration and Housing Improvement Program
description: Contribute socio-urban integration and habitat improvement of vulnerable households.

title: Multiphase Primary Health Care Program for Managing Chronic Non-communicable Dis
description: To increase the effectiveness of the National Government¿s programs geared at reducing the prevalence and improving the management of non-transmissible chronic diseases, based on the Strategy to Strengthen the First Level of Care and the consolidation of health services networks.

title: Provincial Agricultural Services Program - PROSAP IV
description:
The objective of the Conditional Credit Line for Investment Projects (CCLIP) is to contribute to the competitiveness and development of
regional rural economies through the execution of individual programs consistent with this purpose. Specifically, the third individual
operation proposed herein seeks improvements to productivity and an increase in sales and value-added for small and medium-sized
agricultural producers, with a focus on increasing resilience to climate change

title: NORTE GRANDE ROAD INFRASTRUCTURE PROGRAM II
description: Objective: The objective of the program is to improve the accessibility, efficiency, and safety of priority roads of the national road network (RVN) and feeder roads of the provincial road network (RVP) in the Norte Grande region (RNG), through the widening, rehabilitation, and improvement of road corridors that connect production centers with local and foreign markets. To ensure the sustainability of these investments, the works financed by the program will be incorporated into the road maintenance management systems. This objective contributes to sustainable economic development in the RNG. To achieve these objectives, the project was structured under the following main components: (i) engineering works; (ii) road safety; (iii) institution strengthening; (iv) administration, studies, and supervision.

title: Water and Sanitation for Small Communities Program - Tranche II (PROAS II)
description: The general objective of the program is to contribute to improving the quality of life of the population in localities with less than 50,000 inhabitants throughout the national territory through the provision of drinking water and sanitation services.

title: URBAN MUNICIPAL INFRAESTRUCTURE PROGRAM
description: The program main objetcive is to reduce the urban infraestructure deficits existing in municipalities in Argentina

title: Supply Elec. to Country's Regions under Federal Electricity Transmission Plan
description: The general objective of the Program is to efficiently support and contribute to the supply of electricity to the different regions in the argentinian electric system. The works to be financed will help overcome the problems and risks that the electricity transmission system of Argentina faces. The specific objectives of the Program are to: (i) recover the electricity transmission capacity at the provincial level; and (ii) increase the efficiency and reliability of the transmission and distribution systems.
